mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO AS MEMNO, MEM_ID AS MEMID, MEM_NAME AS MEMNAME, TEL, NVL(HOMETEL, '-') AS HOMETEL , NVL(EMAIL,'-') AS EMAIL, FN_GENDER(CRYPTPACK.DECRYPT(SSN2, '1234567')) AS GENDER , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(CRYPTPACK.DECRYPT(SSN2, '1234567'), 1, 1) IN ('1','2') THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)-(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SSN1, 1, 2)) + 1899) WHEN SUBSTR(CRYPTPACK.DECRYPT(SSN2, '1234567'), 1, 1) IN ('3','4') THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)-(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SSN1, 1, 2)) + 1999) ELSE -1 END AS AGE , '(' || ZIP_CODE || ') ' || ADDR || ' ' || DETAIL_ADDR AS ADDR FROM PRIVACY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLACKLIST(BLACK_NO, MEM_NO, BLACK_DATE, ADMIN_ID) VALUES('BLACKLIST-' || SEQ_BLACKLIST.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, SYSDATE, #{adminId})
mapper.select: SELECT INS_NO AS INSNO, REQ_NO AS REQNO, INS_NAME AS INSNAME, INS_ID AS INSID, FN_INSAREA(INS_NO) AS AREA , PRC_DATE AS PRCDATE, DROPREASON FROM INSPRIVACYVIEW
SELECT C.CLASS_NAME AS CLASSNAME FROM CLASS C LEFT JOIN CLASS_STOP CS ON C.CLASS_NO = CS.CLASS_NO WHERE INS_NO=#{insNo} AND CLASS_STARTDATE<SYSDATE AND CLASS_ENDDATE>SYSDATE AND CS.STOP_DATE IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTRUCTOR_DROP(INS_DROP_NO, INS_NO, ADMIN_ID, DROP_REASON, DROP_DATE) VALUES('ID-'||SEQ_ID.NEXTVAL, #{insNo}, #{adminId}, #{dropReason}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT P.MEM_NAME AS INSNAME, P.MEM_ID AS INSID, IR.REQ_NO AS REQNO, IR.REQ_DATE AS REQDATE FROM INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST IR LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST_PRC IRP ON IR.REQ_NO = IRP.REQ_NO LEFT JOIN PRIVACY P ON P.MEM_NO = IR.MEM_NO WHERE IRP.PRC_CODE IS NULL

SELECT EXP_CONTENT AS EXPCONTENT , TO_CHAR(EXP_STARTDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EXPSTARTDATE , TO_CHAR(EXP_ENDDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EXPENDDATE FROM INSEXPVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} ORDER BY EXPSTARTDATE DESC
SELECT PRZ_NAME AS PRZNAME, PRZ_MEDAL AS PRZMEDAL , TO_CHAR(PRZ_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS PRZDATE FROM INSPRZVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} ORDER BY PRZDATE DESC
SELECT CER_NAME AS CERNAME, ISSUE_NAME AS ISSUENAME, PROOF_PATH AS PROOFPATH , TO_CHAR(CER_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CERDATE FROM INSCERVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} ORDER BY CERDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST_PRC(REQ_PRC_NO, REQ_NO, PRC_CODE, PRC_DATE, ADMIN_ID) VALUES('IRP-'||SEQ_IRP.NEXTVAL, #{reqNo}, 1, SYSDATE, #{adminId})
INSERT INTO INSTRUCTOR_REQUEST_PRC(REQ_PRC_NO, REQ_NO, PRC_CODE, PRC_DATE, ADMIN_ID) VALUES('IRP-'||SEQ_IRP.NEXTVAL, #{reqNo}, 2, SYSDATE, #{adminId})
